version_description:
We hope you’re having fun playing Word Crossy! We update the game every week so don't forget to download the latest version to get all the new features and levels!
1. More 2600+levels are waiting for you!
2. New Rank Leaderboard Competition has been added! Compete against everyone for rewards or crush your friends!
3. New Event and Quest Icons added to the map page.
4. New Quests and Daily Quests added!!
5. New limited time VIP Subscription Membership gift packs are here. Join now for for more benefits!!
6. Piggy Bank Optimization
7. Optimized map paths, slide lines, and more.
Thanks for your feedback and keep it coming! We are dedicated to providing you the best.
e-mail：Word_Crossy@outlook.com
Fan Page: https://www.facebook.com/WordCrossy/

We hope you’re having fun playing Word Crossy! We update the game every week so don't forget to download the latest version to get all the new features and levels!
1. More 3200+levels are waiting for you!
2. Update the daily gift experience, now you can automatically receive daily rewards;
3. New German language version has launched.
Thanks for your feedback and keep it coming! We are dedicated to providing you the best.
e-mail：Word_Crossy@outlook.com
Fan Page: https://www.facebook.com/WordCrossy/

Celebrate Halloween with Word Crossy!  
1. New Halloween Challenge event is live!  Challenge 5 Halloween levels every day to claim the rewards.  Open a big treasure chest by completing level 3. And open a huge treasure chest by completing level 5.  This mode will test the skills of experienced and skilled players!
 2. New Butterflies gameplay event!  Progress past level 21 to experience this new gameplay style! Try to complete the word with butterflies to catch them and receive a treasure chest for passing each chapter. Come try the mode, have fun, and earn rewards！ 
3. Fixed bugs 
4. Game experience optimized
Thanks for your feedback and keep it coming! We are dedicated to providing you the best.
e-mail：Word_Crossy@outlook.com
Fan Page: https://www.facebook.com/WordCrossy/

We hope you’re having fun playing Word Crossy! We have updated the sync function! Now you can synchronize all your progress, scores, coins and hints at anytime among multiple devices of the same system.
1. More 3400+levels are waiting for you!
2. Bugs  fixed .
3. Butterflies gameplay experience optimized.
Thanks for your feedback and keep it coming! We are dedicated to providing you the best.
